00001 pro plot_p2f, $
00002     COMPARE = compare
00003 
00004     if strCmp ( getEnv ( 'MACHINE' ), 'jaguar' ) then scratchDir = getEnv ( 'SYSTEM_USERDIR' )
00005     if strCmp ( getEnv ( 'MACHINE' ), 'franklin' ) then scratchDir = getEnv ( 'SCRATCH' )
00006     if strCmp ( getEnv ( 'MACHINE' ), 'dlghp' ) then scratchDir = '/home/dg6/scratch' 
00007     if strCmp ( getEnv ( 'HOSTNAME' ), 'benten.gat.com' ) then scratchDir = '/u/greendl/scratch' 
00008 
00009     ;fileName2  = scratchDir + '/p2f/d3d_D_Heidbrink_delta/data/fdis.dav.nc'
00010     fileName2   = scratchDir + '/p2f/cmod_t0_dlgMod_delta/data/fdis.dav.nc'
00011     eqdsk_fileName   = 'data/g129x129_1051206002.01120.cmod'
00012     ;eqdsk_fileName = 'data/eqdsk.122993'
00013 
00014     amu = 1d0
00015 
00016     e_   = 1.60217646d-19
00017     q   = 1d0 * e_
00018     k   = 1.3806504d-23
00019     mi  = amu * 1.67262158d-27
00020     c   = 3.0d8
00021 
00022     print, '*** Using ', eqdsk_fileName
00023     eqdsk   = readGEQDSK ( eqdsk_fileName )
00024 
00025 if keyword_set ( compare ) then begin
00026 
00027     cdfId   = ncdf_open ( fileName2, /noWrite )
00028     glob    = ncdf_inquire ( cdfId )
00029     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'f_rzvv', f_rzvv2
00030     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binEdges', vPerp_binEdges2
00031     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binEdges', vPar_binEdges2
00032     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binCenters', vPerp_binCenters2
00033     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binCenters', vPar_binCenters2
00034     nCdf_varGet, cdfId, 'nP', nP2
00035 
00036     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'R_nBins' ), name, R_nBins2
00037     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'z_nBins' ), name, z_nBins2
00038     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'vPerp_nBins' ), name, vPerp_nBins2
00039     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'vPar_nBins' ), name, vPar_nBins2
00040 
00041     ncdf_close, cdfId
00042 
00043     dVPer2  = abs ( vPerp_binEdges2[0] - vPerp_binEdges2[1] )
00044     dVPar2  = abs ( vPar_binEdges2[0] - vPar_binEdges2[1] )
00045 
00046 endif
00047     
00048     ; Read netcdf data into variables
00049 
00050     fileName    = 'fdis.dav.nc'
00051 
00052     cdfId   = ncdf_open ( 'data/'+fileName, /noWrite )
00053     glob    = ncdf_inquire ( cdfId )
00054 
00055     ; Read netcdf data into variables
00056 
00057     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'f_rzvv', f_rzvv
00058     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'R_binCenters', R_binCenters
00059     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'z_binCenters', z_binCenters
00060     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binCenters', vPerp_binCenters
00061     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binCenters', vPar_binCenters
00062     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'R_binEdges', R_binEdges
00063     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'z_binEdges', z_binEdges
00064     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binEdges', vPerp_binEdges
00065     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binEdges', vPar_binEdges
00066     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'nP', nP
00067     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'R_binSize', R_binSize
00068     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'z_binSize', z_binSize
00069     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPerp_binSize', vPerp_binSize
00070     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'vPar_binSize', vPar_binSize
00071     ncdf_varGet, cdfId, 'density', density_file
00072 
00073     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'R_nBins' ), name, R_nBins
00074     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'z_nBins' ), name, z_nBins
00075     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'vPerp_nBins' ), name, vPerp_nBins
00076     ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, ncdf_dimId ( cdfId, 'vPar_nBins' ), name, vPar_nBins
00077 
00078     ncdf_close, cdfId
00079 
00080     R_nBins = n_elements ( R_binCenters )
00081     z_nBins = n_elements ( z_binCenters )   
00082     vPerp_nBins = n_elements ( vPerp_binCenters )
00083     vPar_nBins  = n_elements ( vPar_binCenters )    
00084 
00085 if  keyword_set ( compare ) then begin
00086 
00087     R_nBins2    = n_elements ( R_binCenters2 )
00088     z_nBins2    = n_elements ( z_binCenters2 )  
00089     vPerp_nBins2    = n_elements ( vPerp_binCenters2 )
00090     vPar_nBins2 = n_elements ( vPar_binCenters2 )   
00091 
00092 endif
00093 
00094 ;   Create a density map
00095 
00096     vPerp_3D    = rebin ( vPerp_binCenters, vPerp_nBins, R_nBins, z_nBins )
00097     vPerp_3D    = transpose ( vPerp_3D, [2,1,0] )
00098 
00099     R_2D    = rebin ( R_binCenters, R_nBins, z_nBins )
00100 
00101     density = total ( total ( f_rzvv, 4 ) * vPerp_3D , 3 ) * $
00102         vPerp_binSize * vPar_binSize * 2.0 * !pi
00103 
00104 ;   Create nP map
00105 
00106     nParticle_map   = density * z_binSize * R_binSize * R_2D * 2.0 * !pi
00107 
00108 ;   Create wPerp map ( perp energy PER PARTICLE )
00109 
00110     wPerp   = total ( 0.5 * mi * vPerp_3D^2 $
00111                         * total ( f_rzvv, 4 ) * vPerp_3D , 3 ) $
00112         * vPerp_binSize * vPar_binSize * 2.0 * !pi
00113 
00114     wPerp   = wPerp / e_ * 1d-3 / density
00115     iiBad   = where ( density eq 0, iiBadCnt )
00116     if iiBadCnt gt 0 then wPerp[iiBad] = 0
00117 
00118 
00119 ;   Create flux surface averaged quantities
00120 
00121 ;--------------------------------------------
00122 ;   Create a density profile
00123 
00124     density_all = 0.0
00125     wperp_all   = 0.0
00126 
00127     R_all   = 0.0
00128     z_all   = 0.0
00129 
00130     for i = 0, R_nBins-1 do begin
00131         for j = 0, z_nBins - 1 do begin
00132 
00133         q1_  = where ( ( R_binCenters[i] - eqdsk.rbbbs gt 0 ) and ( z_binCenters[j] - eqdsk.zbbbs gt 0 ), q1 )
00134         q2_  = where ( ( R_binCenters[i] - eqdsk.rbbbs gt 0 ) and ( z_binCenters[j] - eqdsk.zbbbs le 0 ), q2 )
00135         q3_  = where ( ( R_binCenters[i] - eqdsk.rbbbs le 0 ) and ( z_binCenters[j] - eqdsk.zbbbs gt 0 ), q3 )
00136         q4_  = where ( ( R_binCenters[i] - eqdsk.rbbbs le 0 ) and ( z_binCenters[j] - eqdsk.zbbbs le 0 ), q4 )
00137 
00138         if ( q1 gt 0 ) and ( q2 gt 0 ) and ( q3 gt 0 ) and ( q4 gt 0 ) then begin
00139             
00140             density_all = [ density_all, density[i,j] ]
00141             wperp_all   = [ wperp_all, wperp[i,j] ]
00142             R_all   = [ R_all, R_binCenters[i] ]
00143             z_all   = [ z_all, z_binCenters[j] ]
00144 
00145         endif
00146 
00147         endfor 
00148     
00149     endfor
00150 
00151     density_all = density_all[1:*]
00152     wperp_all   = wperp_all[1:*]
00153     R_all   = R_all[1:*]
00154     z_all   = Z_all[1:*]
00155  
00156     psi_all = interpolate ( eqdsk.psizr, ( R_all - eqdsk.rleft ) / eqdsk.rdim * eqdsk.nW, $
00157                 ( z_all - min ( eqdsk.z ) ) / eqdsk.zdim * eqdsk.nH )
00158 
00159     psiRange    = abs ( eqdsk.siMag - eqdsk.siBry )
00160     psiNorm_all = ( psi_all - eqdsk.siMag ) / psiRange          
00161 
00162     rho_all = sqrt ( psiNorm_all )  
00163 
00164     R_binCenters2D  = rebin ( R_binCenters, R_nBins, z_nBins )
00165     z_binCenters2D  = transpose ( rebin ( z_binCenters, z_nBins, R_nBins ) )    
00166     psi_2D = interpolate ( eqdsk.psizr, ( R_binCenters2D - eqdsk.rleft ) / eqdsk.rdim * eqdsk.nW, $
00167                 ( z_binCenters2D - min ( eqdsk.z ) ) / eqdsk.zdim * eqdsk.nH )
00168 
00169     psi_2D  = ( psi_2D - eqdsk.siMag ) / psiRange
00170 
00171     ;   Bin by rho coord.
00172 
00173     rho_binEdges    = fIndGen ( R_nBins/2+1 ) / (R_nBins/2)
00174     dRho    = abs(rho_binEdges[1]-rho_binEdges[2])
00175     rho_binCenters  = rho_binEdges[1:*] - dRho/2.0
00176 
00177     density_rho = fltArr ( n_elements ( rho_binCenters ) )
00178     wperp_rho   = fltArr ( n_elements ( rho_binCenters ) )
00179 
00180     for i = 0, n_elements ( rho_binCenters ) - 1 do begin
00181 
00182         iiDx    = where ( rho_all ge rho_binCenters[i] - dRho $
00183                             AND rho_all lt rho_binCenters[i] + dRho $
00184                             AND psiNorm_all le 1, cnt)
00185         if cnt gt 0 then begin
00186             density_rho[i]  = total ( density_all[ iiDx ] ) / cnt
00187             wperp_rho[i]    = total ( wperp_all[ iiDx ] ) / cnt
00188             print, cnt
00189         endif
00190         
00191     endfor
00192 
00193     ;   Create the analytical profile AORSA uses    
00194 
00195     n0  = 1.022e19
00196     nLim    = 2.733e18
00197     alpha   = 0.6
00198     beta_   = 1.4
00199 
00200     ;n0 = 1.522e18
00201     ;nLim   = 0.933e17
00202     ;alpha  = 5.0
00203     ;beta_  = 3.0
00204     
00205     density_rho_aorsa   = nLim + ( n0 - nLim )*(1d0-rho_binCenters^beta_)^alpha
00206 
00207     device, decomposed = 0
00208     !p.background = 255
00209     !p.multi    = [0,1,3]
00210     !p.charSize = 3
00211     window, 1, xSize = 400, ySize = 750
00212     plot, sqrt ( psi_2D ), density/1e19, $
00213         psym = 4, $
00214         xtitle = 'rho', $
00215         ytitle = 'density [m^-3] x1e19', $
00216         xRange = [0, 1], $
00217         color = 0, $

00219         yStyle = 1, $
00220         title = 'ORBIT-rf'
00221     loadct, 12
00222     oPlot, rho_binCenters, density_rho/1e19, $
00223         psym = -4, $
00224         color = 8*16-1, $
00225         thick = 2.0
00226     oPlot, rho_binCenters, density_rho_aorsa/1e19,$
00227         thick = 2.0, $
00228         color = 12*16-1
00229 
00230     plot, sqrt ( psi_2D ), wperp, $
00231         psym = 4, $
00232         xtitle = 'rho', $
00233         ytitle = 'wPerp [keV] per particle', $
00234         xRange = [0, 1], $
00235         color = 0, $
00236         yRange = [0,8], $
00237         yStyle = 1
00238     oPlot, rho_binCenters, wperp_rho, $
00239         psym = -4, $
00240         color = 8*16-1, $
00241         thick = 2.0
00242     
00243 ;
00244 ;--------------------------------------------
00245 
00246 
00247 ;--------------------------------------------
00248 ;   Create a temperature profile by fitting 2D gaussian
00249 ;   functions at each pt in space
00250 
00251     tempProfile = fltArr ( R_nBins, z_nBins )
00252     psiTemp2D   = fltArr ( R_nBins, z_nBins )
00253     rhoTemp2D   = fltArr ( R_nBins, z_nBins )
00254 
00255     for i = 0, R_nBins-1 do begin
00256         print, i
00257         for j = 0, z_nBins-1 do begin
00258         
00259             psiTemp2D[i,j] = interpolate ( eqdsk.psizr, $
00260                 ( R_binCenters[i] - eqdsk.rleft ) / eqdsk.rdim * eqdsk.nW, $
00261                 ( z_binCenters[j] - min ( eqdsk.z ) ) / eqdsk.zdim * eqdsk.nH )
00262 
00263             rhoTemp2D[i,j]  = sqrt ( ( psiTemp2D[i,j] - eqdsk.siMag ) / psiRange )  
00264 
00265             tmp = [reverse(reform(f_rzvv[i,j,*,*]),1),reform(f_rzvv[i,j,*,*])]
00266             if mean ( tmp ) gt 0 then begin
00267                 fit = gauss2dFit ( tmp, A )
00268                 tempProfile[i,j]    = mi * ( $
00269                     ( A[2] * vPerp_binsize )^2 + ( A[3] * vPar_binSize )^2 $
00270                         ) / ( 2.0 * 1e3 * e_ )  
00271             endif
00272 
00273         endfor
00274     endfor
00275     
00276     temp_rho    = fltArr ( n_elements ( rho_binCenters ) )
00277 
00278     for i = 0, n_elements ( rho_binCenters ) - 1 do begin
00279 
00280         iiDx    = where ( rhoTemp2D[*] ge rho_binCenters[i] - dRho $
00281             AND rhoTemp2D[*] lt rho_binCenters[i] + dRho, cnt)
00282         if cnt gt 0 then begin
00283             temp_rho[i] = total ( (tempProfile[*])[ iiDx ] )
00284             temp_rho[i] = temp_rho[i] / cnt
00285             print, cnt
00286         endif
00287         
00288     endfor
00289 
00290     temp_rho    = temp_rho * 1e3
00291 
00292     ;   Create the analytical profile AORSA uses    
00293 
00294     t0  = 2.0e3 
00295     tLim    = 0.052e3
00296     alpha   = 1.3 
00297     beta_   = 1.9
00298 
00299     ;t0 = 24.0e3 
00300     ;tLim   = 2.0e3
00301     ;alpha  = 1.0 
00302     ;beta_  = 2.8
00303 
00304 
00305     temp_rho_aorsa  = tLim + ( t0 - tLim )*(1d0-rho_binCenters^beta_)^alpha
00306 
00307     plot, rhoTemp2D, tempProfile, $
00308         yTitle = 'temperature [keV]', $
00309         xTitle = 'rho', $
00310         thick = 1, $
00311         color = 0, $
00312         psym = 4, $
00313         xRange = [0,1.0], $
00314         xStyle = 1, $
00315         yStyle = 1, $
00316         yRange = [0, 5]
00317 
00318     oPlot,rho_binCenters, temp_rho_aorsa/1e3, $
00319         color = 12*16-1, $
00320         thick = 2
00321 
00322     oPlot, rho_binCenters, temp_rho/1e3, $
00323         psym = -4, $
00324         color = 8*16-1, $
00325         thick = 2
00326 
00327 ;
00328 ;--------------------------------------------
00329 
00330 
00331     dVPer   = abs ( vPerp_binEdges[0] - vPerp_binEdges[1] )
00332     dVPar   = abs ( vPar_binEdges[0] - vPar_binEdges[1] )
00333     dR  = abs ( R_binEdges[0] - R_binEdges[1] )
00334     dz  = abs ( z_binEdges[0] - z_binEdges[1] )
00335 
00336     
00337     ; Plot
00338 
00339     old_dev = !D.name
00340     set_plot, 'ps'
00341     outfname    = 'data/'+fileName+'.eps'
00342     device, filename=outfname, preview=0, /color, bits_per_pixel=8, $
00343         xsize=25, ysize=37.5,xoffset=.1, yoffset=.1, /encapsul
00344 
00345     nLevs   = 10 
00346     levScale    = 1d-7
00347     levels  = 10.0^fIndGen(nLevs)*levScale
00348     colors  = reverse ( bytScl ( fIndGen(nLevs), top = 253 ) + 1 )
00349     loadct, 0
00350 
00351     !p.multi = [0,R_nBins,z_nBins]
00352     
00353     for j=0,z_nBins-1 do begin
00354         for i=0,R_nBins-1 do begin
00355     
00356             f_vv_smooth = f_rzvv[i,j,*,*]
00357         
00358             contour, transpose ( f_vv_smooth )>min(levels), $
00359                 vPar_binCenters / 3.0e6, vPerp_binCenters / 3.0e6, $
00360                 levels = levels, $
00361                 c_colors = colors, $
00362                 color = 0, $
00363                 charSize = 0.01, $
00364                 xRange = [min(vPar_binCenters),max(vPar_binCenters)] / 3.0e6,$
00365                 yRange = [0.0,max(vPerp_binCenters)] / 3.0e6, $
00366                 title = 'R: '+string ( r_binCenters[i], for='(f5.2)' ) $
00367                     + ' z: '+string ( z_binCenters[j], for='(f5.2)' ), $
00368                 xTicks = 1, $
00369                 yTicks = 1, $
00370                 xStyle = 9, $
00371                 yStyle = 9, $
00372                 thick = 0.5
00373 
00374             print, i, j
00375         endfor  
00376     endfor  
00377 
00378     !p.position = 0
00379     !p.charSize = 2 
00380     loadct, 0
00381     xyOuts, 0.98, 0.975, 'fileName: '+fileName, color = 0, /norm, align = 1.0
00382     xyOuts, 0.98, 0.95, 'nP: '+string(nP,format='(e7.1)'), color = 0, /norm, align = 1.0
00383     xyOuts, 0.98, 0.925, 'R_nBins: '+string(R_nBins,format='(i3.3)'), color = 0, /norm, align = 1.0
00384     xyOuts, 0.98, 0.9, 'z_nBins: '+string(z_nBins,format='(i3.3)'), color = 0, /norm, align = 1.0
00385     xyOuts, 0.98, 0.875, 'vPerp_nBins: '+string(vPerp_nBins,format='(i3.3)'), color = 0, /norm, align = 1.0
00386     xyOuts, 0.98, 0.85, 'vPar_nBins: '+string(vPar_nBins,format='(i3.3)'), color = 0, /norm, align = 1.0
00387 
00388     device, /close
00389 
00390 if keyword_set ( compare ) then begin
00391 
00392     set_plot, 'X'
00393     !p.multi = [0,3,3]
00394     !p.charsize = 3.0
00395     !p.background = 255
00396     window, 0, xSize = 1200, ySize = 600
00397     device, decomposed = 0
00398     loadct, 12
00399 
00400     pt  = where ( density eq max ( density ) )
00401     i   = (array_indices(density,pt))[0]
00402     j   = (array_indices(density,pt))[1]
00403 
00404     densityHere = density[i,j]
00405     tempHere    = tempProfile[i,j]  
00406 
00407     f_vv    = reform(f_rzvv[i,j,*,*])
00408     f_vv2   = reform(f_rzvv2[i,j,*,*])
00409 
00410     vPer2D  = rebin(vPerp_binCenters,vPerp_nBins,vPar_nBins)
00411     vPer2D2 = rebin(vPerp_binCenters2,vPerp_nBins2,vPar_nBins2)
00412 
00413     ;   Create analytical maxwellian
00414 
00415 
00416     T_keV    = tempHere ; [keV]  
00417     T   = T_keV * 1d3 * e_ / k
00418 
00419     f_vv_a  = fltArr ( size ( f_vv, /dim ) )
00420     
00421     for i = 0, n_elements ( vPerp_binCenters ) - 1 do begin
00422         for j = 0, n_elements ( vPar_binCenters ) - 1 do begin
00423             v   = sqrt ( (vPerp_binCenters[i]^2) $
00424                     + (vPar_binCenters[j]^2) )
00425             meanV   = 0.0
00426             f_vv_a[i,j] = $
00427                  ( mi / ( 2.0 * !pi * k * T ))^1.5 * $
00428                     exp ( -  mi * (v-meanV)^2 / (2.0*k*T) )
00429         endfor
00430     endfor
00431     
00432     f_vv_a  = densityHere * f_vv_a $
00433         / total ( f_vv_a * rebin(vPerp_binCenters,vPerp_nBins,vPar_nBins) * dVpar * dVPer * 2.0 * !Pi )
00434 
00435     dfdupar = dlg_pderiv ( f_vv, 2, dVpar )
00436     dfdupar2    = dlg_pderiv ( f_vv2, 2, dVpar2 )
00437     dfdupar_a   = dlg_pderiv ( f_vv_a, 2, dVpar )
00438 
00439     dfduper = dlg_pderiv ( f_vv, 1, dVper )
00440     dfduper2    = dlg_pderiv ( f_vv2, 1, dVper2 )
00441     dfduper_a   = dlg_pderiv ( f_vv_a, 1, dVper )
00442 
00443     ;   Interpoate to match grids
00444     
00445     nGridPer    = (vPerp_binCenters2 - min ( vPerp_binCenters )) $
00446         / ( max ( vPerp_binCenters ) - min ( vPerp_binCenters ) ) * (vPerp_nBins-1)
00447 
00448     nGridPar    = (vPar_binCenters2 - min ( vPar_binCenters )) $
00449         / ( max ( vPar_binCenters ) - min ( vPar_binCenters ) ) * (vPar_nBins-1)
00450 
00451     f_vv_a  = interpolate ( f_vv_a, nGridPer, nGridPar, /grid )
00452     f_vv    = interpolate ( f_vv, nGridPer, nGridPar, /grid )
00453     dfduper_a   = interpolate ( dfduper_a, nGridPer, nGridPar, /grid )
00454     dfdupar_a   = interpolate ( dfdupar_a, nGridPer, nGridPar, /grid )
00455     dfduper = interpolate ( dfduper, nGridPer, nGridPar, /grid )
00456     dfdupar = interpolate ( dfdupar, nGridPer, nGridPar, /grid )
00457 
00458     plot, vPar_binCenters2, f_vv2[1,*], color = 0 
00459     oplot, vPar_binCenters2, f_vv[1,*], color = 12*16-1, thick = 2.0
00460     oplot, vPar_binCenters2, f_vv_a[1,*], color = 2*16-1, thick = 2.0
00461
